name: ANICTO
description:
ANICTO is a game about a space traveler who finds himself stranded on a freezing planet. After a malfunction sent his lifepod and his ship to separate locations on said planet, he has to find his way back to his ship before he succumbs to the cold. Luckily the crash has ignited a small fire spending a tiny amount of comforting warmth and light. Your mission will be to keep the flame alive and make it back to the safety of your ship. Do not let the fire extinguish as it is the only thing keeping you alive.

Made during the LudumDare 46 Gamejam

CONTROLS: Mouse and keyboard
 Walk: WASD
 Pick up items/torch from fire: Left Mouse
 Fuel fire: Left Mouse
 Drop items: Right Mouse
 Create new Firepit with three stones: E
Return to main menu: R
 
 TOOLS USED:
     Unity
     Blender
     Krita
     LMMS
     Audacity
     yopad
